Articles.Content:
this is my first misión so some stuff may be wrong but i hope you enjoy!

Links:

Change log:

V 0.1:Release

V0.2:Added aditional dialog to help the player a bit

V0.3:Added new dialogs and fixed an issiue that made the mission imposible to complete.Added the mission to the steam workshop

Edited July 6, 2018 by KerbolExplorer

Played it :-)

It was a nice litte mission with some funny moments.

It's nice for the training of easy maneuvers in Orbit :-)
Hey guys im here just to say that a new patch came for this mission it is a very small one.I only  added an additional dialog.to help some players a bit

Hey guy. I have a couple of bits of feedback for you. 

If this is meant for new players, I'd suggest giving the ship a reaction wheel part. They may be less realistic, but they're MUCH easier to use and a newbie doesn't have to worry about running out of monopropellant. 

The dialog could still be clearer, and I don't see how to end the mission. I ran through all the steps and landed, but then nothing happened. 

But it's a nice little mission. Thank you.

New update out!

heres what i changed :

V0.3:Added new dialogs and fixed an issiue that made the mission imposible to complete.Added the mission to the steam workshop

I hope you enjoy!
